rows.label: tev001401_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ]. How's it going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you need some backup, just say so.
I'm always willing to help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Not that you're extra-special or anything—it's just one
of my duties as a senior officer. Anyway, feel free to
bring me along if you want.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0011
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0004
rows.name: Roger that. Leave the hard parts to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hey if you're sure you can handle it, then great.
But if you ever run into trouble, come find me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Wait, so your next mission is in Noctilum?
Then you'll want to leave through the west gate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0007
rows.name:
You know, I'm between missions right now.
Why don't I come along and show you the way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've eradicated more than a few Noctilum indigens.
I could be a big help to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0031
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0041
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Then let's not waste any time!
The west gate's over in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0010
rows.name:
You sure? Well, if you need more backup,
just come find me. Roger that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0015
rows.name:
I've got my own mission to do right now,
so I doubt I'll be able to help with yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Er, sorry if you were counting on me.
Try me again next time, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0021
rows.name: Don't worry—I'm not going to freak out on you again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0022
rows.name:
Such things are disrespectful to my teammates.
I realize that now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0023
rows.name:
And with that out of the way, let's get moving!
I've got your back, no matter the mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0050
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0051
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0061
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0024
rows.name: Right on. Let's team up and take these bastards down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0025
rows.name:
You sure? Well, if you need more backup,
come find me. Roger that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0030
rows.name:
We don't have time to be looking over our
shoulders right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0031
rows.name:
We have to hurry and find the Lifehold Core so we can
bring Marcus back to us. So bring me along, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0071
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0032
rows.name: Roger that. Leave the hard parts to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0033
rows.name:
You sure? Well, if you need more backup,
come find me. Roger that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0038
rows.name:
Looks like it'll be a while before Lao's mimeosome is in
working order again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0039
rows.name:
And if he ain't moving, that's just more work we'll have
to do in his stead. Speaking of, you need any help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0091
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0040
rows.name:
You got it. I'll make sure that anyone who stands in
our way doesn't stand for long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0041
rows.name:
You sure? Well, if you need more backup,
come find me. Roger that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Hey, wait. You have to take me with you on this one.
I won't be satisfied until I can look Lao in the eyes
and ask him a question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0047
rows.name:
And if he gives the wrong answer, I won't be satisfied
until I can pummel him with my own two fists!
So take me along![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0111
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0048
rows.name:
Thanks. If he really did betray us, then we're gonna
make him answer for what he did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0049
rows.name: But the pummeling! I was gonna pummel him so hard![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0054
rows.name:
We have to secure the Lifehold Core and give everyone
here some semblance of a normal life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0055
rows.name:
We'll do it for my little brother and everyone else we
left behind on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0056
rows.name:
Right, [ST:playername ]? Let's do this!
You and me, baby![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0131
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0057
rows.name: Right on. Let's team up and take these bastards down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0058
rows.name: All right. If you change your mind, let me know ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0063
rows.name:
So long as Mira's overrun with dangerous indigens
and Ganglion loyalists are fighting for their cause,
an Interceptor's work is never done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0064
rows.name: So if you need a hand, I've always got two right here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0065
rows.name:
What say we get out there right now and do some
damage? You know, for the security of New LA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0151
rows.name: Add Irina to your team.

rows.label: tev001401_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001401_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline Irina's request for now.

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0066
rows.name:
You got it. I'll make sure that anyone who stands in
our way doesn't stand for long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0067
rows.name:
You sure? Well, if you need more backup,
come find me. Understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]! What's up?
You need my help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001401_MSG0069
rows.name:
Afraid I can't right now—I've got a mission that just
won't quit. But hit me up next time, all right?[ST:wait ]
